definitions.definition: a meeting in which someone asks you questions to see if you are suitable for a job or course:
a meeting in which someone answers questions about himself or herself for a newspaper article, television show, etc.:
examples: an exclusive interview with Johnny Depp

definitions.definition: a meeting in which the police ask someone questions to see if they have committed a crime
to ask someone questions in an interview:
examples: We've had 200 applicants for the job, but we only plan to interview about 20 of them.

definitions.definition: to answer questions in an interview for a job or course:
examples: I interviewed for several jobs but I didn't get any of them.
